com.gt.android.ui.widget

Interface CarouselView.ViewTransformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoverFlowViewTransformer, FlatMerryGoRoundTransformer, ImmutableTransformer, InverseTimeMachineViewTransformer, LinearViewTransformer, ParameterizableViewTransformer, ParameterizedViewTransformer, TimeMachineViewTransformer, WheelViewTransformer
    Enclosing class:
    CarouselView

    public static interface CarouselView.ViewTransformer
    Interface definition of a view transformer based on position offset.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAttach(CarouselLayoutManager layoutManager)
      Called when attaching the transformer to a CarouselLayoutManager.
      void transform(android.view.View view, float position)
      Transform a given item view based on position.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttach

        void onAttach(CarouselLayoutManager layoutManager)
        Called when attaching the transformer to a CarouselLayoutManager. Allowing to set behaviours of CarouselLayoutManager, e.g. drawOrder.
        Parameters:
        layoutManager -
        See Also:
        CarouselLayoutManager#setDrawOrder(DrawOrder), CarouselLayoutManager#setScroller(Scroller)

      • transform

        void transform(android.view.View view,
               float position)
        Transform a given item view based on position. Usually translate, rotation, alpha, visibility, ... may be altered.
        Parameters:
        view - Item view
        position - For example, 0 for the current center-most item at a stable position; 4 for 4-th item at the right to the current item; -3 for 3-rd item at the left to the current item; 0.1 for the current item with 10% offset right to its stable position.
